title: uSkyBlock空岛插件怎么增加普通玩家的空岛人数？
txt_content:
uSkyBlock空岛插件怎么增加普通玩家的空岛人数？
OP的空岛可以邀请8个好友，但是普通玩家只能邀请4个？
怎么增加人数上限？8个人的空岛还能增加吗？
求权限

replies.author: cc7w
replies.txt_content:
1207741285 发表于 2017-7-22 13:39
Config里面找不到这个设置项，在哪里？单独给usb.extra.party5权限还是没用
# This section allows donors to get specific perks
#donor-perks:
#  usb:
#    donor:
#      example:
#        # permission: usb.donor.example will give the below extra items
#        maxPartySize: 5
#        schematics: [LargeIsland]
#        animals: 60
#        monsters: 100
#        villagers: 24
#        rewardBonus: 0.5
#        hungerReduction: 0.5

原文的这里被注释掉了

replies.author: cc7w
replies.txt_content:
options:
  general:
    # [integer] The max number of players allowed in a single party. (including the leader)
    maxPartySize: 4
普通玩家 4 个

1345979462 发表于 2017-7-22 12:43
options:
  general:
    #  The max number of players allowed in a single party. (including the leade ...
能不能给单独玩家权限？就是我想给VIP8个空岛人数的权限！

replies.author: cc7w
replies.txt_content:
1207741285 发表于 2017-7-22 12:48
能不能给单独玩家权限？就是我想给VIP8个空岛人数的权限！
这是配置文件中的选项哦

1345979462 发表于 2017-7-22 12:52
这是配置文件中的选项哦
我知道是配置文件的，我想知道OP默认创8个人的空岛，但是普通玩家只能创4个人，肯定是有权限节点的吧！

replies.author: cc7w
replies.txt_content:
The second one can be added to the "maxPartyPermissions:" section and is build up as followed:

# This section allows donors to get specific perks
donor-perks:
  usb:
    perk:
      party5:
        maxPartySize: 15           #<---gives a max of 15 players on your island
      party6:
        maxPartySize: 16           #<---gives a max of 16 players on your island
      GiveItYourOwnNameX:
        GiveItYourOwnNameX: 123    #<---gives a max of 123 players on your island
The permissions that are used here would then look like

usb.extra.party5
usb.extra.party6
usb.extra.GiveItYourOwnNameX
In both cases you can add as many permissions as you like or need, but make sure they all have their unique name.

是有的呢
看一下上面的例子哦

1345979462 发表于 2017-7-22 12:59
The second one can be added to the "maxPartyPermissions:" section and is build up as followed:

# Th ...
Config里面找不到这个设置项，在哪里？单独给usb.extra.party5权限还是没用

replies.txt_content:

Config里面找不到这个设置项，在哪里？单独给usb.extra.party5权限还是没用
config找这个
maxPartyPermissions:

然后按照上面添加
